class.name: bbr.b2b.regional.logistic.taxdocuments.entities.DOTaxDocumentState
class.sql-query: WITH dotdstemp AS( SELECT dotds.dotaxdocument_id, MAX(dotds.when1) AS when1 FROM logistica.dotaxdocumentticket AS dotdt JOIN logistica.dotaxdocument AS dotd ON dotd.dotaxdocumentticket_id = dotdt.id JOIN logistica.dotaxdocumentstate AS dotds ON dotds.dotaxdocument_id = dotd.id JOIN logistica.dotaxdocumentstatetype AS dotdst ON dotdst.id = dotds.dotaxdocumentstatetype_id WHERE dotdt.id = :ticketid AND (dotdst.code = 'DTE_VAL' OR dotdst.code = 'DOC_FAL' OR dotdst.code = 'W_RM_INV') GROUP BY dotds.dotaxdocument_id) SELECT oc.number AS directordernumber, dotd.number AS dotaxdocumentnumber, dotdst.code AS dotaxdocumentstatetypecode, dotdst.name AS dotaxdocumentstatetype, dotds.comment, dotds.when1 AS when FROM dotdstemp JOIN logistica.dotaxdocumentstate AS dotds ON dotds.dotaxdocument_id = dotdstemp.dotaxdocument_id AND dotds.when1 = dotdstemp.when1 JOIN logistica.dotaxdocumentstatetype AS dotdst ON dotdst.id = dotds.dotaxdocumentstatetype_id JOIN logistica.dotaxdocument AS dotd ON dotd.id = dotds.dotaxdocument_id JOIN logistica.directorder AS oc ON oc.id = dotd.directorder_id
